channel.title: /!\ How to get this annoying message away? /!\
channel.description:
Evertime i click a Quest tab or inventory or close an interface i get this messages:
Base is Corruption X
How to get this away??? [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2me96qd.png[/img]

item.title: /!\ How to get this annoying message away? /!\
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

Only YOU can see it. And you should be glad you can see it. Because you can see what actions you are doing , which is great incase you need anything.

Read full topic
item.source: /!\ How to get this annoying message away? /!\
